Text saved: You should write about your dreams.
This helps you remember more things about the dream.
Think about the people in your dream.
And think about the place.
These things might be important.
After one week, you will write a lot.
You will be surprised.
Then you can connect your dreams to your life.
You can connect them to things that happen every day.
You can also connect them to your feelings.
